      • getUtility

        public double getUtility(Bid b)
        Description copied from class: AdditiveUtilitySpace
        implements UtilitySpace
        Specified by:
        getUtility in interface UtilitySpace
        Overrides:
        getUtility in class AdditiveUtilitySpace
        Parameters:
        b - of which we are interested in its utility.
        Returns:
        Utility of the given bid. This utility is undiscounted: there is no time dependent devaluation of the utility. See also UtilitySpace.discount(double, double).
